snippet: As President Obama pointed out, football must change because of the long-term damage from concussions.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's remarks pointing out danger of long-term damage from concussions in run-up to Super Bowl, which injected some reality into endless rituals glorifying sport of football in advance of game.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama pointed out, football must change because of the long-term damage from concussions.

headline.seo: Nagging Concerns Before the Super Bowl
headline.main: Nagging Concerns Before the Big Game
headline.print_headline: Nagging Concerns Before the Big Game
